definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ho 2:1 sand (perh. as turning or whirling; otherwise explained by Sta, vid. sub [[חֲוִילָה]]; NH id., Aram. [[חָלָא]], h.olo0)—´[[ח]] abs. Ge 22:17 + 15 t.; cstr. Ge 32:13 + 6 t.;—sand Ex 2:12 (E); set as bound for sea Je 5:22; ´[[שְׂפֻנֵי טמוני ח]] De 33:19 hidden treasures of sand, poet. for glass (regarded as mysteriously produced out of sand, v. Di and reff.);

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: usu. sand of seashore, sim. of numberlessness, vastness, so of Abraham's seed Ge 22:17 (J; cf. Ge 15:5); Jacob's Ge 32:13 (E) of a host Jos 11:4 (JE), Ju Jdg 7:12, 1Sa 13:5, 2Sa 17:11; a people 1Ki 4:20, Ho 2:1, Is 10:22, Is 48:19 (‖[[וְחֶאֱחָאֵי מֶעֶיךָ כִּמְעׂתָָיו]]), Je 33:22, Hb Hab 1:9; of corn gathered by Joseph Ge 41:49; of days of Job Job 29:18 (on interpr. = phoenix, vid. Di); of birds [[עוף כנף]] (i.e. quails) Ps 78:27 (‖[[כֶּעָפָר]]); of vast extent of Sol.'s wisdom 1Ki 5:9.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in comp., more than the sand Je 15:8 (widows of Judah); thoughts of God Ps 139:18.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of weight (in balances), metaph. of Job's vexation ([[כַּעַשׂ]]) Job 6:3 heavier than the sand, cf. [[וְנֵטֶל הַחוֹל]] Pr 27:3 (‖[[כּׂבֶד]] [[אֶבֶן]]), said of [[כַּעַס אֱוִיל]].—Combinations are: ´[[כח]] [[אשׁר על שׂפת הים]] Ge 22:17, Jos 11:4, 1Sa 13:5, 1Ki 5:9; [[הַיׇּם]] ´[[כח]] Ge 32:13, Ge 41:49, Is 10:22, Ho 2:1 (+ [[אשׁר לא יִמַּד]] [[ולא יִסָּפֵר]]); [[הַיׇּם]] ´[[ח]] Je 33:22; [[שֶׁעַל־שׂפת הים לרב]] ´[[כח]] Ju Jdg 7:12; [[אשׁר־על־הים לרב]] ´[[כח]] 2Sa 17:11, 1Ki 4:20; [[חול יַמִּים]]([[מ]]) Job 6:3, Ps 78:27, Je 15:8.
